Something's wrong with aspect ration... Figures are longer, or picture should be a bit wider... Everzthing else is just perfect.

The last poster is correct
Th aspect ratio is wrong
It's 1.25

Makes the actors look tall & skinny...

^ Your player isn't adjusting it right, this rip comes from a PAL DVD. Try forcing a change in the aspect ratio as PAL doesn't use perfectly square pixels. If you use a player like VLC it should be easy. This also allows people to watch it on a PAL tv again with the full resolution.
